intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6901_10: Oh, what’s the matter? Is something wrong?

I want to explore more battle strategies, but I’m
having a hard time coming up with good ideas.

Sun ascends, moon sets... We shall battle those
quite strong in a certain type...

So from your fortune-telling, you’re saying we’ll
get a chance to battle experts of different types,
right?

Strong opponents will make my Pokémon grow
like weeds!

What do you say we keep on growing together,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6801_10:
I read your book on fortune-telling, Olympia.
It helped me a lot.

Oh, really? It’s quite popular, so every time I ask
Darach to get it, it’s sold out...

My new book will soon be found in stores
everywhere...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6802_10: Why? Are you interested in them, too, Gordie?!
Solid! Then let’s go digging for some right now!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6803_10:
You’ve got an athletic build—and a suit perfect
for swimming...
Please help me with my trials, Wake!
Hm? Are you recruiting again, Lana?

I’m not sure what’s going on, but if you’re talking
about battling, then count on me!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6804_10: I’m the best Dragon-type master around!

That lady there looks strong, so that would make
you third strongest.
And I’m the best, of course.
I’m only second strongest? How can that be?!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6805_10:
Splendid! Your theory has improved my machine’s
accuracy!
No, no, there’s still room for improvement!

We should install the latest Macro Cosmos CPU.
But the problem would be the cooling method...
Listening to all this is making me hungry...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6806_10:
I never knew she was
that famous...
I hear you’re Ms. Opal’s disciple...

Do you know that old la— I mean, do you know
Ms. Opal?

Yes, she’s the very definition of a seasoned
Fairy-type veteran.
I’d love to age gracefully, just like she has.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6807_10:
A home vegetable garden
might be nice!

If you like cooking, you should try growing your
own fruit and vegetables.

You can also enjoy the lovely flowers before they
bear fruit, so I second the recommendation!

Nice! Maybe I could ask if it’s OK to build a
garden somewhere and give it a go!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6808_10:
I’m keeping a closer eye on what I eat these days,
for my training!

Oh? Why is that? I thought you were more focused
on gaining muscle.
And for that, you need the right nutrients!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6809_10: When the battle begins, we’ll protect you, Cheryl!

I’ll deal with the ones in front, and you can handle
the ones in back...

*giggle* Thank you. I appreciate the thought, but
I don’t think that’s necessary.
My Pokémon are itching for a battle!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6810_10:
H-how are the headphones we repaired and
enhanced, Elesa?

Oh, they’re great! Both of you are amazing... I’m
glad I asked you to fix them!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6811_10:
You’re quite dedicated to being an Elite Four
member somewhere warm—Hoenn—all for the
sake of training your ice Pokémon.

I must say, there are quite a few stoics among us
Ice-type users.

I guess I’m not in a position to comment about
other people, though.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6812_10:
What is the land like in the Sinnoh region? As a
farmer, I’m curious.

Hmm... I could answer which ground layers ruins
have been found in...

If you’re planning on growing crops, then the
west—somewhere near Floaroma Town—may
be best?
The north is snowy, and the east has marshlands.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6813_10: I am a master of disguise!

I am Looker—a master of disguise! But even I
never expected you to create a duplicate
of yourself!

My ability to transform is a secret ninja technique!
I won’t lose easily!

Sounds fun! If you can disguise and make a copy
of yourself, you could even form your own
band alone!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6814_10:
Vespiquen and Beedrill are both yellow and
black—so dangerous and cool!
Yeah, I know what you mean, Bugsy!

Oh, that’s wonderful, you two! Both of your artistic
brains have been stimulated!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6815_10:
It’s better if you can’t
see it...
I want to see what you two can!
R-really? But...you have so much...around you...
Ahaha! It’s always lively and looks fun!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6816_10: I want to feel the wind...

Both of your gyms are wonderful. You can feel
the wind...

But challengers often become frightened, even
though it feels so nice to fly by cannon.

Some challengers immediately withdraw after
entering my Gym, too. I wonder why...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6817_10:
Must be nice to be Dark-type Pokémon. They don’t
worry about what others think.

Well well, look what you’re saying. I thought you
were a police officer.
Dark-type users like us don’t play into stereotypes.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2023/6818_10:
The mightiest Trainer who doesn’t speak much...
That’s Red for ya!

Sometimes when we’re focused and get real quiet,
we can look like Red, too!
